column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered the Lou deep dish for my family of four. The butter crust was so tasty and
column2: and the sauce and tomatoes were fresh! I wasn't a huge fan of all the cheese
column4: but if you love lots of cheese
column5: this is perfect for you. It is a bit of a wait to get the pizza because it takes a while to cook
column6: but I would say it's worth it! Definitely mark out some time from your day to eat here.
